sentences.english: Francis is accused of having helped him to concoct a false alibi.
sentences.chinese: 弗朗西斯因幫助他捏造不在犯罪現場的證據而被起訴。

sentences.english: She also looked good in a CSI uniform.
sentences.chinese: 她在《犯罪現場調查》裏穿制服也很好看。

sentences.english: That doesn't suppose you were absent at the scene of the crime.
sentences.chinese: 那並不能說明你不在犯罪現場。

sentences.english: Black insulating tapes are familiar evidence at criminal sites.
sentences.chinese: 黑色絕緣膠帶是犯罪現場的常見物證。

sentences.english: The witness averred that he had seen the suspect at the scene of the crime.
sentences.chinese: 證人斷言他看到嫌犯出現在犯罪現場。

sentences.english: Amy's brother was caught red-handed at the scene of the crime.
sentences.chinese: 艾米的哥哥在犯罪現場被逮了個正着。

sentences.english: The police viewed the scene of the crime.
The police dog sniffed the crime scene for clues.
sentences.chinese: 警犬在犯罪現場聞來聞去尋找線索。

sentences.english: Just don't investigate CSI-style with a black light.
sentences.chinese: 只是不要用紫外光燈來進行犯罪現場調查。

sentences.english: The newspaper printed disturbing photos of the crime scene.
sentences.chinese: 這份報紙刊印了駭人的犯罪現場照片。

sentences.english: Leaving your own name at the crime scene was one of the stupidest things I've found.
sentences.chinese: 把你的名字留在犯罪現場是我見過最愚蠢的事情之一。

sentences.english: In this cosmic crime scene, it's all about heat and chemistry.
sentences.chinese: 在這個天體犯罪現場，熱度和化學物質是重要的證據。

sentences.english: A ballistics expert was taking evidence at the scene of the crime.
sentences.chinese: 一位彈道學家正在犯罪現場提取證據。

sentences.english: He took an oath that he had seen the defendant leaving the scene of crime.
sentences.chinese: 他賭咒曾看到過被告從犯罪現場離開。

sentences.english: Thrill-seekers descended upon  the scene of the crime.
sentences.chinese: 尋求刺激者急速接近犯罪現場。

sentences.english: The vividness of the description of crime scenes made the book a classic mystery novel.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪現場的生動描述使該書成爲經典的神祕小說。
